trans-unit.source: Provides a type converter to convert 64-bit signed integer objects to and from various other representations.
trans-unit.target: Fornece um conversor de tipo para converter objetos de inteiro com sinal de 64 bits para e a partir de diversas outras representações.

trans-unit.source: This converter can only convert a 64-bit signed integer object to and from a string.
trans-unit.target: Este conversor pode converter somente um objeto inteiro assinado de 64 bits para e de uma cadeia de caracteres.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Int64> value type represents integers with values ranging from negative 9,223,372,036,854,775,808 through positive 9,223,372,036,854,775,807.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Int64>tipo de valor representa inteiros com valores que variam de 9.223.372.036.854.775.808 negativo ao 9.223.372.036.854.775.807 positivo.</xref:System.Int64>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.ConvertFrom%2A> method uses the <xref:System.Int64.Parse%2A> method of <xref:System.Int64> with the integer value of <xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.ConvertFrom%2A>método usa o <xref:System.Int64.Parse%2A>método <xref:System.Int64>com o valor inteiro do <xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles>.</xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles> </xref:System.Int64> </xref:System.Int64.Parse%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.ConvertFrom%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.ConvertTo%2A> method uses the general ("G") format for the string returned.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.ConvertTo%2A>método usa o formato geral ("G") para a cadeia de caracteres retornada.</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.ConvertTo%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about type converters, see the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter> base class and [How to: Implement a Type Converter](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre conversores de tipo, consulte o <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>classe base e [como: implementar um conversor de tipo](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > You should never create an instance of an Int64Converter.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Você nunca deve criar uma instância de um Int64Converter.

Em vez disso, chame o <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.GetConverter%2A>método de <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor> </xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.GetConverter%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the examples in the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter> base class.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte os exemplos de <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>classe base.</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Int64Converter"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Int64Converter"> </xref> classe.
